information: AGROB is an online marketplace where we connect business to business for bulk purchase and supplies across various industries such as agriculture, food and beverages, gardening, hospitality and textiles. At AGROB, we are committed to help businesses in saving their time and money simply by offering high quality products online and getting the products delivered anywhere. We work with various vendors and suppliers globally and offer their products and services on our platform. Our users can explore and order anything from various categories such as Agricultural Drones, Agricultural inputs raw materials, Food & Beverages- organic pulses, Indian spices, Basmati rice, Brazilian wines, Vertical Gardening solutions for homes , offices, and farms, Textiles-, Bath towels, hand towels, jacquard towels, beach towels, bed sheets, pillow covers, linens etc. We have also partnered with leading digital banks to ensure robust and secured payment gateway for our users. AGROB SASU is Headquartered in Paris, France and with a Regional Asian office in Gurgaon, India. We offer support to our users across European and Asian Countries. AGROB is going to be a true one stop solution for all business.
